thread.title: Auli'i Cravalho's dream of becoming Disney princess finally fulfilled
thread.title_full: Auli'i Cravalho's dream of becoming Disney princess finally fulfilled - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Auli'i Cravalho's dream of becoming Disney princess finally fulfilled
text:
Auli'i Cravalho's dream of becoming a Disney princess has finally been fulfilled, as she will now feature in the upcoming musical adventure film 'Moana'.
Recalling her audition for the movie, the 14-year-old Native Hawaiian said producers auditioned hundreds of women before zeroing in on her, People magazine reports.
Expressing her happiness, Cravalho took to twitter to say, "So excited to be a part of Moana! Can't wait to get back in the studio!"
Helmed by John Musker and Ron Clements, the upcoming film centers around a young woman who journeys to a mythical island. The movie will hit the theaters in November 2016.
